price: Ibiddi fuula isaanii ni gubdi, Isaanis achi keessatti soqolamoodha (fuulaa fokkatoota). {1}
arabic: تَلۡفَحُ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا كَٰلِحُونَ
footnotes: {1} soqolamoo jechuun nama hidhiin jalaa irraa gadidachaatee gadi harkifamtee ilkeen dirretti baatee fakkate jechuudha.

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: talfaḥu wujūhahumu al-nāru wahum fīhā kāliḥūna
